```{r dataload}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = TRUE)
#load jsonlite library to read json file
library(jsonlite)
#read the file and assign to crisis
crisis <- fromJSON("~/Rprojects/PTSD_VAMC_2015/VeteransCrisisLineFY14FOIA1500242.json")
```


# Introduction to the VA Crisis Line data






```{r dataprep}

#load chron library to convert CALL_Duration field into a time only (no date) object
library(chron)

crisis$CALL_DURATION <- times(crisis$CALL_DURATION)

```
